---
title: "ACCDMi Newsletter - November 2025"
---

Thanks for your support of ACCDMi!

- The deadline is Wednesday November 26 to email your talk titles to Francis Anokye for the ACCDMi symposium (Wednesday December 10). Talks will be short (12 mins). The aim of this event is to familiarize ourselves with each others research. Everyone is encouraged to participate.

- The ACCDMi keynote talk (December 10) will be given by Dr. Nick Ogden (Public Health Agency of Canada).

- Congratulations to the [2025 ACCDMi scholarship recipients](https://ahurford.github.io/accdmi-website/trainees.html)!

- ACCDMi has a logo! Please use the [logo](https://ahurford.github.io/accdmi-website/logo.html) for your ACCDMi-related presentations.

- Please email Amy Hurford any ACCDMi-related publications for the website.
